Package git.jluvisi.util

Class ConfigManager

Object
ConfigManager
public class ConfigManager
extends Object
This class is used to manage different configuration files within the plugin. More Specifically: 'config.yml' and 'signs.yml'.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ConfigManager​(MicroGames plugin, String fileName)
    Allows direct interaction with Configuration files.
